backstory: Cambridge-educated Brutalist fan who once wrote a 600-page thesis on 'honest concrete.' He now freelances, charging by the sneer, while living in a glass-and-plywood micro-loft he pretends is experimental.

backstory: Former guidance-counselor turned traveling motivational speaker; survived a lightning strike and now celebrates quirks as 'human lightning.'
style: Warm baritone, dad-joke energy; says 'you do you!' often, applauds uniqueness with whooping cheer, sprinkles gentle affirmations.

persona_name: Chef Vinnie Vicious – Cocky Culinary Crusader
